# init(suggestedAction:)

**Initializer**

Creates a query to obtain electricity guidance based on forecasted energy usage.

## Declaration

```swift
init(suggestedAction: ElectricityGuidance.SuggestedAction)
```

## Parameters

- **suggestedAction**: The [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricityGuidance/SuggestedAction-swift.enum] that you request.
title: init(suggestedAction:)
